com.seagate.csp.gui.dlg

Class DialogManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.seagate.csp.gui.dlg.DialogManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Destroyable

    public class DialogManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Destroyable
    Dialog manager. Makes, shows and destroys Dialogs.

    • Method Detail

      • showDialog

        public void showDialog(java.awt.Component parentComponent,
              DialogMaker dialogMaker)
        Make and show a dialog. Tip: use lookupDialog() to get ahold of dialog after it has been shown.
        Parameters:
        parentComponent - parent component. The root window of this component will be supplied to the dialog maker.
        dialogMaker - dialog maker instance.

      • makeDialog

        public Dialog makeDialog(java.awt.Component parentComponent,
                DialogMaker dialogMaker)
        Make a dialog. NOTE: use this if you need to update the dialog between making it and showing it. Example: MyDialog myDialog = (myDialog) dialogManager.makeDialog(...) myDialog.setSomeParameter(...) myDialog.show()
        Parameters:
        parentComponent - parent component.
        dialogMaker - dialog maker instance.
        Returns:
        dialog dialog made or null if dialog creation failed.

      • lookupDialog

        public Dialog lookupDialog(java.lang.Object id)

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroy all registered dialogs.
        Specified by:
        destroy in interface Destroyable
